SkillInfo.En:
Deliver slashes with a large sword.
Landing the first hit will allow further consecutive slashes.
SkillInfo.Jp:
大剣で斬りつける
攻撃を当てることで連続斬りが可能

SkillCommand.En:
After <KC ATTACK1>, delay a moment then
repeatedly press <KC ATTACK1>.
SkillCommand.Jp: <KC ATTACK1>後、少し遅らせて<KC ATTACK1>を連続して押す

SkillInfo.En:
Deliver slashes over a wide area with a large sword.
Landing the first hit will allow further consecutive slashes.
SkillInfo.Jp:
大剣で広範囲に対して斬撃を放つ
攻撃を当てることで連続斬りが可能

SkillCommand.En: Hold <KC ATTACK2> for a moment then release.

SkillInfo.En:
Lift and charge greatsword, then swing down.
Release at max charge for huge damage boost.
Damage rises with revenge gauge level.
<COL ffdc78>LV+: Boosts attack power.
Evolves to Indominitable Lash.</COL>
SkillInfo.Jp:
振り上げた大剣に力を溜め、振り下ろす
溜め満了の瞬間にボタンを離すと威力大幅上昇
リベンジゲージ蓄積量に応じて、さらに威力が増加
<COL ffdc78>LV UPでさらに攻撃威力が上昇する
＜真・魔人斬り＞に進化</COL>

SkillCommand.En: Hold <KC ATTACK2> for a moment then release.

SkillInfo.En:
Charges power into raised greatsword for
a mighty downward strike. Releasing at
perfect moment boosts damage. Power
further increases with revenge gauge
accumulation.
SkillInfo.Jp:
振り上げた大剣に力を溜め、渾身の力で振り下ろす
溜め満了の瞬間にボタンを離すと威力大幅上昇
リベンジゲージ蓄積量に応じて、さらに威力が増加

SkillInfo.En:
Steel yourself, and endure an enemy's attack.
Increases the Revenge Gauge a bit when hit by an attack.
SkillInfo.Jp:
身を固め、敵の攻撃に耐える
攻撃を受けとめるとリベンジゲージが増加する

SkillInfo.En:
Hold yourself in a crouched position, and toss
nearby allies into the air.
SkillInfo.Jp:
腰を落とした姿勢で構え、
近接してきた仲間を上方に放りあげる

SkillCommand.En: While in the air, press <KC ATTACK1>.

SkillInfo.En: Deliver slashes with the blade while in the air.
SkillInfo.Jp: 空中で大剣の一撃を振るう

SkillCommand.En: While in the air, press <KC ATTACK2>.

SkillInfo.En:
Slam the blade downward while in the air,
delivering multiple hits.
Damage rises when performed from high altitudes.
SkillInfo.Jp:
空中から多段ヒット性能を持つ振り下ろし攻撃を放つ
高所から行うことで威力が上昇する

SkillCommand.En: While being knocked away, press <KC JUMP>.
SkillCommand.Jp: 吹き飛ばされ中に<KC JUMP>を押す

SkillInfo.En: Recover from being knocked away while in the air.
SkillInfo.Jp: 転倒を回避し体勢を立て直す

SkillCommand.En:
While climbing an enemy,
hold <KC ATTACK1> for a moment then release.
SkillCommand.Jp: しがみつき中に<KC ATTACK1>長押し後、離すと発動

SkillInfo.En:
While clinging to an enemy, the user readies the
blade briefly, and delivers a single devastating blow.
SkillInfo.Jp:
しがみついた状態から力を溜め、
破壊力のある一撃を放つ
